attributes.action: Help us get a decent payrise at betfred
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are all looking for a decent sized payrise from betfred, rather than the standard 3% we have been given.

We have worked for this company years and have done some very good work on there behalf and feel its about time we got a decent payrise.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
